instructions.name: withdrawFromFee
docs: Withdraw `amount` from the Auction House Fee Account to a provided destination account.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority key for the Auction House.

accounts.name: feeWithdrawalDestination
docs: Account that pays for fees if the marketplace executes sales.

accounts.name: auctionHouseFeeAccount
docs: Auction House instance fee account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

instructions.name: withdrawFromTreasury
docs: Withdraw `amount` from the Auction House Treasury Account to a provided destination account.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Treasury mint account, either native SOL mint or a SPL token mint.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority key for the Auction House.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestination
docs: SOL or SPL token account to receive Auction House fees. If treasury mint is native this will be the same as the `treasury_withdrawl_destination_owner`.

accounts.name: auctionHouseTreasury
docs: Auction House treasury PDA account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

instructions.name: updateAuctionHouse
docs: Update Auction House values such as seller fee basis points, update authority, treasury account, etc.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Treasury mint account, either native SOL mint or a SPL token mint.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Key paying SOL fees for setting up the Auction House.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority key for the Auction House.

accounts.name: newAuthority
docs: New authority key for the Auction House.

accounts.name: feeWithdrawalDestination
docs: Account that pays for fees if the marketplace executes sales.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestination
docs: SOL or SPL token account to receive Auction House fees. If treasury mint is native this will be the same as the `treasury_withdrawl_destination_owner`.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestinationOwner
docs: Owner of the `treasury_withdrawal_destination` account or the same address if the `treasury_mint` is native.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

instructions.name: createAuctionHouse
docs: Create a new Auction House instance.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Treasury mint account, either native SOL mint or a SPL token mint.

accounts.name: payer
docs: Key paying SOL fees for setting up the Auction House.

accounts.name: feeWithdrawalDestination
docs: Account that pays for fees if the marketplace executes sales.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestination
docs: SOL or SPL token account to receive Auction House fees. If treasury mint is native this will be the same as the `treasury_withdrawl_destination_owner`.

accounts.name: treasuryWithdrawalDestinationOwner
docs: Owner of the `treasury_withdrawal_destination` account or the same address if the `treasury_mint` is native.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseFeeAccount
docs: Auction House instance fee account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseTreasury
docs: Auction House instance treasury PDA account.

instructions.name: buy
docs: Create a private buy bid by creating a `buyer_trade_state` account and an `escrow_payment` account and funding the escrow with the necessary SOL or SPL token amount.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: paymentAccount
docs: User SOL or SPL account to transfer funds from.

accounts.name: transferAuthority
docs: SPL token account transfer authority.

accounts.name: treasuryMint
docs: Auction House instance treasury mint account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: SPL token account.

accounts.name: metadata
docs: SPL token account metadata.

accounts.name: escrowPaymentAccount
docs: Buyer escrow payment account PDA.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Auction House instance authority account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

docs: Auction House instance fee account.

instructions.name: publicBuy
docs: Create a public buy bid by creating a `public_buyer_trade_state` account and an `escrow_payment` account and funding the escrow with the necessary SOL or SPL token amount.

instructions.name: auctioneerPublicBuy
docs: Create a public buy bid by creating a `public_buyer_trade_state` account and an `escrow_payment` account and funding the escrow with the necessary SOL or SPL token amount.

accounts.name: auctioneerAuthority
docs: The auctioneer authority - typically a PDA of the Auctioneer program running this action.

accounts.name: ahAuctioneerPda
docs: The auctioneer PDA owned by Auction House storing scopes.

instructions.name: cancel
docs: Cancel a bid or ask by revoking the token delegate, transferring all lamports from the trade state account to the fee payer, and setting the trade state account data to zero so it can be garbage collected.

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: SPL token account containing the token of the sale to be canceled.

accounts.name: tokenMint
docs: Token mint account of SPL token.

accounts.name: authority
docs: Auction House instance authority account.

accounts.name: auctionHouse
docs: Auction House instance PDA account.

accounts.name: auctionHouseFeeAccount
docs: Auction House instance fee account.

accounts.name: tradeState
docs: Trade state PDA account representing the bid or ask to be canceled.

instructions.name: auctioneerCancel
docs: Cancel, but with an auctioneer

accounts.name: wallet
docs: User wallet account.

accounts.name: tokenAccount
docs: SPL token account containing the token of the sale to be canceled.

docs: Token mint account of SPL token.

instructions.name: printListingReceipt
docs: Create a listing receipt by creating a `listing_receipt` account.

instructions.name: cancelListingReceipt
docs: Cancel an active listing receipt by setting the `canceled_at` field to the current time.

instructions.name: printBidReceipt
docs: Create a bid receipt by creating a `bid_receipt` account.

instructions.name: cancelBidReceipt
docs: Cancel an active bid receipt by setting the `canceled_at` field to the current time.

instructions.name: printPurchaseReceipt
docs: Create a purchase receipt by creating a `purchase_receipt` account.

accounts.name: BidReceipt
docs: Receipt for a bid transaction.

accounts.name: ListingReceipt
docs: Receipt for a listing transaction.

accounts.name: PurchaseReceipt
docs: Receipt for a purchase transaction.

errors.name: ExpectedSolAccount
errors.msg: Expected a sol account but got an spl token account instead

errors.name: SOLWalletMustSign
errors.msg: If paying with sol, sol wallet must be signer

errors.name: CannotTakeThisActionWithoutAuctionHouseSignOff
errors.msg: Cannot take this action without auction house signing too

errors.name: NoPayerPresent
errors.msg: No payer present on this txn

errors.name: BothPartiesNeedToAgreeToSale
errors.msg: Both parties need to agree to this sale

errors.name: CannotMatchFreeSalesWithoutAuctionHouseOrSellerSignoff
errors.msg: Cannot match free sales unless the auction house or seller signs off

errors.name: SellerATACannotHaveDelegate
errors.msg: Seller ata cannot have a delegate set

errors.name: BuyerATACannotHaveDelegate
errors.msg: Buyer ata cannot have a delegate set

errors.name: InvalidBasisPoints
errors.msg: BP must be less than or equal to 10000

errors.name: TradeStateDoesntExist
errors.msg: The trade state account does not exist

errors.name: TradeStateIsNotEmpty
errors.msg: The trade state is not empty

errors.name: InvalidAuctioneer
errors.msg: Invalid Auctioneer for this Auction House instance.

errors.name: MissingAuctioneerScope
errors.msg: The Auctioneer does not have the correct scope for this action.

errors.name: BumpSeedNotInHashMap
errors.msg: Bump seed not in hash map.

errors.name: EscrowUnderRentExemption
errors.msg: The instruction would drain the escrow below rent exemption threshold

errors.name: InvalidSeedsOrAuctionHouseNotDelegated
errors.msg: Invalid seeds or Auction House not delegated

errors.name: BuyerTradeStateNotValid
errors.msg: The buyer trade state was unable to be initialized.

errors.name: MissingElementForPartialOrder
errors.msg: Partial order size and price must both be provided in a partial buy.

errors.name: NotEnoughTokensAvailableForPurchase
errors.msg: Amount of tokens available for purchase is less than the partial order amount.

errors.name: PartialPriceMismatch
errors.msg: Calculated partial price does not not partial price that was provided.

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in escrow account to purchase.

errors.name: SaleRequiresExactlyOneSigner
errors.msg: This sale requires exactly one signer: either the seller or the authority.
